argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cphsca.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | cphsca.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_cphsubrg | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_subrgss | |- ( K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) -> K C_ CC ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> K C_ CC ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simpr1 | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> A e. K ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sseldd | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpr2 | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> B e. K ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_sseldd | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simpr3 | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> B =/= 0 ) |
| 13 | 9, 11, 12 | #P_divrecd | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> ( A / B ) = ( A x. ( 1 / B ) ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 2 | #P_cphreccl | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) -> ( 1 / B ) e. K ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_3adant3r1 | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> ( 1 / B ) e. K ) |
| 16 |  | #P_cnfldmul | |- x. = ( .r ` CCfld ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_subrgmcl | |- ( ( K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) /\ A e. K /\ ( 1 / B ) e. K ) -> ( A x. ( 1 / B ) ) e. K ) |
| 18 | 4, 8, 15, 17 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> ( A x. ( 1 / B ) ) e. K ) |
| 19 | 13, 18 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> ( A / B ) e. K ) |
